title: Get Connected
author: unknown
text:
The introduction of the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) in the European Union (EU) will have a significant impact on businesses importing goods into the EU. The regulation on the CBAM officially entered into force on 17 May 2023 and the CBAM transitional period started on 1 October 2023.   Curious to learn more about the CBAM and how to prepare for its arrival? Download our flyer to discover the most important policy considerations and how to successfully implement them.  If you want to stay up-to-date with the latest developments, visit our CBAM overview page. Rebecca Pehlivan Partner Global Trade Advisory T +31882880901 E [email protected]
